page.title: 09Taylor Industrial Estate
page.content: Taylor Industrial Estate is on the A574 Culcheth to Warrington road, opposite the Glaziers Lane junction. The Estate covers 22 acres. It was opened in 1959 on land once owned by the Admiralty. At present there are 40 firms which together employ about 400 people. The firms are housed in units. The largest single unit has an area of 56,000 square feet. We visited the site office and spoke to Mr.Brian Taylor, whose family owns the Estate. His office has a computer that stores information about the units, their owners and the rents. Most firms provide services like meat packing, vehicle repair and book storage. A few firms make products like terrariums and metal castings. Every company we asked about had chosen the Estate because the M6 and M62 motorways are nearby.
